template.template: SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
template.name: SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
template.description: Contacts: saftehnika.com, techsupport@saftehnika.com. Basic template for SAF radio Integra-X. Trap processing and Ethernet statistics included.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/CPU_load_Integra_X)>80
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/CPU_load_Integra_X)<75
trigger.name: CPU load Notification

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: {HOST.HOST} High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

item.name: LAN1 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1)=2
trigger.name: LAN1 administrative status

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN1 administrative status changed

item.name: LAN2 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2)=2
trigger.name: LAN2 administrative status

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN2 administrative status changed

item.name: LAN3 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 administrative status

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN3 administrative status changed

item.name: LAN1 Port Speed
item.description: Link speed in 1 000 000 * bits per second.

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN1)=1
trigger.name: LAN1 Port Speed changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN2)=1
trigger.name: LAN2 Port Speed changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN3)=1
trigger.name: LAN3 Port Speed changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=1
trigger.name: LAN1 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN1 administrative status
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=1
trigger.name: LAN2 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN2 administrative status
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=1
trigger.name: LAN3 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN3 administrative status
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3)=2

item.name: ACM engine status ModemA
item.description: ACM engine status

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2
trigger.name: Modem A not locked

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAerroredSecond))>1
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAerroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem A errored second count increased

item.name: ModemA errored second ratio
item.description: Modem performance errored second ratio

item.name: FEC load ModemA
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value (floating point in textual representation)

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAfecLoad)>={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAfecLoad)<{$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: Modem A FEC load Error

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

item.name: ModemA modulation ACMmax
item.description: Maximal modulation for ACM enabled profile

item.name: ModemA modulation ACMmin
item.description: Minimal modulation for ACM enabled profile

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAnormalizedMse)>={$MSEMIN}
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAnormalizedMse)<{$MSEMIN}
trigger.name: Modem A MSE Error

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemArxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem A Rx Capacity changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemArxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem A Actual Rx modulation changed

item.name: ModemA severely Errored seconds
item.description: Modem performance severely errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAseverelyErroredSecond))>=10
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAseverelyErroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem A SES count increased

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

item.name: ModemA severely Errored second ratio
item.description: Modem performance severely errored second ratio

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: Modem A temperature Error

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAtxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem A Tx Capacity changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAtxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem A Actual Tx modulation changed

item.name: ModemA XPD estimated
item.description: XPD Estimated value (floating point value multiplied by 10)

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAxpdEst),{$XPDESTMIN},{$XPDESTMAX})=0
trigger.name: ModemA XPD Threshold alarm

dependency.name: XPIC off
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"XPIC"

item.name: ACM engine status ModemB
item.description: ACM engine status

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2
trigger.name: Modem B not locked

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBandwidth)=1
trigger.name: Bandwidth changed {SAF Integra-X Modem module v_1.9:integraXmodemBandwidth.last()}

item.name: ModemB errored seconds
item.description: Modem performance errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBerroredSecond))>=10
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBerroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem B errored second count increased

item.name: ModemB errored seconds ratio
item.description: Modem performance errored second ratio

item.name: FEC load ModemB
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBfecLoad)>={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBfecLoad)<{$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: Modem B FEC Load Error

item.name: ModemB modulation ACMmax
item.description: Maximal modulation for ACM enabled profile

item.name: ModemB modulation ACMmin
item.description: Minimal modulation for ACM enabled profile

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBnormalizedMse)>={$MSEMIN}
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBnormalizedMse)<{$MSEMIN}
trigger.name: Modem B MSE Error

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBrxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Rx Capacity changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBrxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Actual Rx modulation changed

item.name: ModemB severely Errored seconds
item.description: Modem performance severely errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBseverelyErroredSecond))>10
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBseverelyErroredSecond))<5
trigger.name: Modem B SES errors increased

item.name: ModemB severely Errored seconds ratio
item.description: Modem performance severely errored second ratio

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: Modem B temperature Error

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBtxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Tx Capacity changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBtxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Actual Tx modulation changed

item.name: ModemB XPD estimated
item.description: XPD Estimated value (floating point value multiplied by 10)

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBxpdEst),{$XPDESTMIN},{$XPDESTMAX})=0
trigger.name: ModemB XPD Threshold alarm

dependency.name: XPIC off
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"XPIC"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"
trigger.name: Operational mode A

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"
trigger.name: Operational mode B

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"XPIC"
trigger.name: XPIC off

item.name: IP address Local
item.description: Local IP address

item.name: IP Address Remote
item.description: Remote IP address

item.name: Duplex shift RadioA
item.description: Utilized duplex shift in kHz

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioApll)=1
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioApll)=0
trigger.name: Radio A PLL Error

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioArxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio A Rx frequency change

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioArxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.name: Radio A Rx level Error

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioAtxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio A Tx frequency change

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioAtxMute)=1
trigger.name: Radio A Tx muted

item.name: Tx power RadioA
item.description: Output power of radio transmitter

item.name: Duplex shift RadioB
item.description: Utilized duplex shift in kHz

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBpll)=1
trigger.name: Radio B PLL Error

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBrxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio B Rx frequency change

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBrxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBrxLevel)>{$RXLEVMIN} or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBrxLevel)<{$RXLEVMAX}
trigger.name: Radio B Rx level Error

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBtxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio B Tx frequency change

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBtxMute)=1
trigger.name: Radio B Tx muted

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysBoardTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System Board Temperature Error

item.name: CPU Idle
item.description: System CPU idle

item.name: CPU temperature
item.description: System CPU temperature

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysCPUtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: CPU temperature Error

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysDeviceProductModel)=1
trigger.name: Product Model changed

item.name: Device Serial Number
item.description: Device serial number

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysDeviceSerial)=1
trigger.name: Device Serial changed

item.name: PSU current
item.description: PSU current in ampers

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysPSUcurrent),{$PSUCURRMIN},{$PSUCURRMAX})=0
trigger.name: System PSU current out of range

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysPSUpower),{$PSUPOWMIN},{$PSUPOWMAX})=0
trigger.name: System PSU power out of range

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysPSUvoltage),{$PSUVOLTMIN},{$PSUVOLTMAX})=0
trigger.name: System PSU voltage Alarm threshold

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/IntegraX_System_Memory_used)>95
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/IntegraX_System_Memory_used)<90
trigger.name: System Memory usage High

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/rintegraXradioAtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio A Temperature Error

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/rintegraXradioBtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio B Temperature Error

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

item.name: System contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Location name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name,#2))=1 and length(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name))>0
trigger.name: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: System name has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: System uptime
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/system.uptime[sysUpTime.0])<10m
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted (uptime < 10m)

dependency.name: No SNMP data collection
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=4
trigger.name: License unlimited

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=3 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysLicenseExpire)<=1209600
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=1 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=4 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysLicenseExpire)>1209600
trigger.name: Licence alarm
trigger.description: License expires within 2 weeks or already expired

dependency.name: License unlimited
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=4

item.host: SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
